column5: Great trip, just returned from a week of fantastic fishing . In our camp 8 of us had 27 Pike 20 pounds or better with the largest being 28 pounds . We also had 10 lake trout over thirty pounds with the largest being 38 pounds. .Not a bad week for having a lot of weather changes.I personally had a day of pike fishing with 5 fish over 20 pounds. Good luck to you who haven't went on their trips yet.
